name: interior-design
description: A interior designing website for our internship project.

scripts.prestart: clear && echo Installing Dependencies... && npm install
scripts.start: clear && echo Pruning devDependencies... && npm prune --production
scripts.pretest: ( cls || clear ) && echo Installing Dependencies... && npm install
scripts.test: ( cls || clear ) && set NODE_ENV=development && nodemon src/index.js
